If all beaches disappeared, where would you go to relax?

The Indoor Spas: Indoor spas could become the new go-to destination for relaxation. These spas offer a range of treatments such as massages, facials, and body scrubs. They also have saunas, steam rooms, and hot tubs that can help people relax and unwind.

The Virtual Vacations: Virtual reality technology could allow people to experience the beauty of beaches from the comfort of their homes. They could put on a VR headset and take a virtual tour of the world's most beautiful beaches. This could be a great way for people to relax and unwind without leaving their homes.

The City Rooftops: City rooftops could become the new hotspots for relaxation. These rooftops offer stunning views of the city skyline and can be a great place to unwind and enjoy the sun. People could set up a hammock or a comfortable chair and spend the day soaking up the sun and enjoying the views.

The Urban Oases: Urban oases could be the new go-to destination for relaxation. These oases are designed to provide a peaceful and serene environment in the heart of the city. They offer lush greenery, beautiful gardens, and serene ponds. People could go for a walk, have a picnic, or simply relax and unwind in a peaceful environment.
